paper_abstract: Using the fixed point method, we prove the Hyers-Ulam stability of the following generalized Jensen quadratic functional equation f (x + y/r + sz) + f (x + y/r - sz) + f (x - y/r + sz) + f (x - y/r - sz) = 4/r(2) f(x) + 4/r(2) f(y) + 4s(2) f (z) in fuzzy Banach spaces.
paper_title: On the fuzzy stability of a generalized Jensen quadratic functional equation
